member.name: M:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.#ctor(Semver.SemVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct, with an exact version.
member.param: The exact version to assign to the range.

member.name: M:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.#ctor(Semver.SemVersion,Semver.SemVersion,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct, with the specified version range details.
member.param: The minimum version in the range. Can be null to avoid a minimum version.
The maximum version in the range. Can be null to avoid a maximum version.
Indicates whether the specified version is inclusive. Defaults to true.
Indicates whether the specified version is inclusive. Defaults to false.
member.exception: Thrown if both and versions are null, or if the minimum version is greater than the maximum version.

member.name: P:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.Minimum
member.summary: Gets the minimum version of the range. If null, there is no minimum version.

member.name: P:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.MinimumInclusive
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the version number is inclusive.

member.name: P:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.Maximum
member.summary: Gets the maximum version of the range. If null, there is no maximum version.

member.name: P:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.MaximumInclusive
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the version number is inclusive.

member.name: M:Jeevan.SemverRanges.SemverRange.IsUndefined
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance of is undefined. This can happen if the default constructor is used to create the instance.
